TopicTitle: Structural Bulkheads for MK2 and MK3

Articles.Content: We need simple structural bulkheads for the MK2 and MK3 space plane cross sections. Just simple plates in the same color as the fuel tanks and cargo bays in those sizes, no more than 1/10th of a meter thick. Because these space plane cross sections are curved, you cannot cobble together bulkheads from the existing structural plates.
